mapper.select: select * from MEMBER_T order by member_num desc
select * from notice order by notice_num desc
select * from class order by notice_num desc

select * from ADMIN_T where admin_id = #{admin_id} and admin_pw=#{admin_pw}

select * from bookedclass where member_num = #{member_num} and rownum = 1

select * from teacher where use_yn = 'Y' order by teacher_num

mapper.insert: insert into teacher( teacher_num, teacher_name, teacher_phone, teacher_addr, teacher_gen, teacher_career, teacher_img, teacher_type, use_yn) values( teacher_seq.nextval, #{teacher_name}, #{teacher_phone}, #{teacher_addr}, #{teacher_gen}, #{teacher_career}, #{teacher_img}, #{teacher_type}, 'Y')

insert into MEMBER_T ( member_num, member_id, member_name, member_gen, member_birth, member_signup_date, member_addr, member_pw, member_mail, member_point, member_chargep, member_usep, member_phone) values ( member_t_seq.nextval, #{member_id}, #{member_name}, #{member_gen}, TO_DATE(#{member_birth}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{member_signup_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{member_addr}, #{member_pw}, #{member_mail}, 50000, null, null, #{member_phone})
insert into notice( notice_num, notice_text) values( notice_seq.nextval, #{notice_text})
mapper.select: select m.member_num, m.member_name, m.member_id, m.member_phone, m.member_point, a.point_money, a.point_signup_date, a.point_charge_date from member_t m, pointapprove a where m.member_num = a.member_num
mapper.update: update teacher set teacher_name =#{teacher_name}, teacher_phone=#{teacher_phone}, teacher_addr=#{teacher_addr}, teacher_gen=#{teacher_gen}, teacher_career=#{teacher_career}, teacher_img=#{teacher_img}, teacher_type=#{teacher_type}, where teacher_num=#{teacher_num}
